name: Billy Dixon's Magical Saxophone
description:
You are a curious shopper who has just entered an antique store. What lies in there? What will happen if you start randomly touching the antiques? Why are you randomly touching the antiques? These questions will all be answered... Except for that last one, that's a you problem, not a me problem.

Move with the arrow keys / wasd keys / swiping on the screen (but recommended for devices with keyboards)

By Nishaant Derasari for the November Bitsy Jam (This is my first game jam! I had a lot of fun)
